Words Words Words Words Words Words Words Words Words Words

Viruses can plague the Windows OS on your PC. It can be costly to remove. Many times, you will have a virus on your computer and won’t know it until one rears its head. When try to remove it, and more often than not, you find a handful of other viruses.

What you might see on your PC if a virus is on your computer: your internet gets redirected to another web page you didn’t request; if your desktop icons disappear; if your programs do not open; if you have a new “anti-virus” program that you are unfamiliar with, most likely you are plagued. If your computer is slow. If your friends and contacts receive unintended emails from you, selling unheard of items, then you have been infected.
BUT, it’s not that difficult to remove. Follow the following steps
